name: Golden Tee Fore!
overview:
The classic arcade golfing game is now better than ever thanks to Golden Tee Fore! Complete by Incredible Technologies.

Fore! Complete offers seven additional new courses over the previous Golden Tee Fore! releases (spanning from 2001-2005) while packing in the courses and gameplay that you know and love. Designed for all skill levels, Golden Tee Fore! Complete also has additional game features, set timed pricing and other game functions that can be controlled from your desktop computer. It is also fully compatible with the Golden Tee Course Add-on software package, the [opular Hole-n-win Feature, and LIVE editions features Player Stats and Personal History Tracking.
